ai-sn27:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for the eye,
ai-sn27:1.1.3_0: or whatever desire and greed for the mind is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.5_0: or tongue and body is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.6_0: or conceit and the mind is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.7_0: or mind is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:1.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up these six corruptions of heart,
ai-sn27:1.1.9_0: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
ai-sn27:2.1.7_0: or thoughts is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:2.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up these six corruptions of heart,
ai-sn27:2.1.9_0: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
ai-sn27:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye consciousness,
ai-sn27:3.1.7_0: or mind consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:3.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up these six corruptions of heart,
ai-sn27:3.1.9_0: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
ai-sn27:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye contact,
ai-sn27:4.1.7_0: or mind contact is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:4.1.8_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-sn27:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for feeling born of eye contact,
ai-sn27:5.1.7_0: or feeling born of mind contact,
ai-sn27:5.1.8_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-sn27:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for perception of sights,
ai-sn27:6.1.7_0: or perception of thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:6.1.8_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-sn27:6.1.10_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn27:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for intention regarding sights,
ai-sn27:7.1.7_0: or intention regarding thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:7.1.8_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-sn27:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for craving for sights,
ai-sn27:8.1.7_0: or craving for thoughts is a corruption of the mind. ...”
ai-sn27:8.1.8_0: When a mendicant has done these things,
ai-sn27:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, desire and greed for the earth element,
ai-sn27:9.1.4_0: The cessation, settling, and ending of the fire element ...
ai-sn27:9.1.7_0: or consciousness is a corruption of the mind element.
ai-sn27:9.1.8_0: When a mendicant has given up these six corruptions of heart,
ai-sn27:9.1.9_0: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
ai-sn27:10.1.2_1: or consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
ai-sn27:10.1.3_0: When a mendicant has given up these five corruptions of heart,
ai-sn27:10.1.4_0: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
ai-sn27:10.1.6_0: The first sub-chapter on defilements is finished.
ai-sn27:10.2.4_0: the aggregates element comes to be,
ai-sn27:10.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on corruptions are complete.
